players.name: Alice
memory: You: "Charlie's death is suspicious, and I believe he was a villager."
Diana: "Alice is the mafioso. I investigated her last night and she is guilty."
Bob: "Diana, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Alice instead of someone more suspicious like Charlie?"
Diana: "I investigated Alice because I had to start somewhere, and she seemed the most suspicious. Bob, are you defending her?"
Bob: "Diana, if you're the detective, why reveal your investigation so early? That seems like a mafia tactic to mislead us."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
